additionalProperty.name: Ingredients
additionalProperty.value: Water, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate, Sodium Chloride, Sodium Xylenesulfonate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Citrate, Fragrance, Piroctone Olamine, Dimethiconol, Citric Acid, Menthol, Sodium Benzoate, Sodium Salicylate, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Dimethicone, Tetrasodium EDTA, TEA-Dodecylbenzenesulfonate, Trideceth-10, Propylene Glycol, Mentha Arvensis Leaf Oil, Mentha Piperita (Peppermint) Oil, Eucalyptus Globulus Leaf Extract

additionalProperty.name: Warning
additionalProperty.value: Avoid contact with eyes. If in eyes, rinse well with water
